Day 1: Vail

Posted on Wednesday, December 19, 2007

John and I arrived in Denver at 7:30AM. We got our rental car (a brand new VW Passat!), and headed straight down I-70 West to Vail. After a few mishaps searching for a jacket, and findings some skis, we hit the slopes!

John
